name: Golden Triangle with Wildlife and Tigers
description:
Offering the fascinating blend of culture and wildlife in one package is India, the land of mysticism. Get enchanted with the royal city of Jaipur, the ghost town of Fatehpur Sikhri, the historical town of Agra and the wildlife tour.

Experience the essence of life in India by strolling the quaint lanes of Old Delhi where you also can revel in a Sufi Qawali performance. The most popular destination Jaipur has a lot to explore. Get a bird’s eye view the royal pink city early mornings from a hot air balloon. You can even picnic at Mehtab Bhag and watch the mesmerising sight of the sun receding in the background of the glamorous Taj Mahal. Listen to the true roar of a Tiger in an open canter jeep at Ranthambhore.
